titleStmt.title: A serious and pathetical contemplation of the mercies of God in several most devout and sublime thanksgivings for the same / published by the Reverend Doctor Hicks at the request of a friend of the authors.
titleStmt.author: Traherne, Thomas, d. 1674.
Hickes, George, 1642-1715.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Traherne. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
